sentences.sentence: Parsley is one of the most commonly used herbs.
sentences.translation: 欧芹是最常用的草药之一。

sentences.sentence: Remove from the heat, add the parsley, toss and serve at once.
sentences.translation: 从火上端下来，加入香芹，搅拌后立刻上桌。

sentences.sentence: Nutmeg, parsley and cider all complement the flavour of these beans well.
sentences.translation: 肉豆蔻、欧芹和苹果酒都凸显这些菜豆的味道。
